name: Keyman Developer Customization Source File
summary: Learn about .KCT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You will most likely only come across a KCT file if you have Keyman Developer installed on your computer. The file is created using the Branding Editor included with Keyman Developer. If you are building a custom product installer, the KCT file must be selected when you create the product installer. When the product installer is being built, the KCT file is compiled into a .PXX file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
